title: THIS CURSED MACHINE Post-Mortem: Onchain Chaos as Narrative
description:
“Live in the pod, fulfil orders, get bugs.”

THIS CURSED MACHINE is a fully onchain sci-fi body horror fulfilment center simulator by Moving Castles, a game studio for the tactical research and development of autonomous worlds.

We will speak about learnings of launching an autonomous world onchain (Redstone) and how we embraced the emergent chaos by making the bot attacks, exploits and player corporations part of the narrative of the world itself.
